categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Pinky" was the nickname of a Tuttin System Security Force officer on Tuttin IV during the Galactic Civil War. After Ryley Ancum had been evaluated by Alliance Intelligence scout Keth Beamis, and he dismissed Onjo Fegel, Pinky and another security force officer approached Keth, questioning him about Maiferri Tag, who had been arrested on charge of espionage. Both officers took Ryler and Keth to the Admin Centre and placed the two in separate cells despite their protests.
